title: Video Quality in the Settings
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the settings screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user observes the settings
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a Video Quality setting should be present

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I tap on the Video Quality setting
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a modal pops up with bitrate settings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I tap on the Video Quality setting for the first time
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the default value selected in the modal is “Auto”

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I tap on the Video Quality setting
AND I select a bitrate
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the setting should persist and be applied as a max bitrate to all video content
